user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I need ideas for team-building activities.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of engaging team-building activities suitable for corporate events.
Gather detailed descriptions for each team-building activity, including objectives and participant engagement.
Find or create images that visually represent each team-building activity to enhance the presentation.
Compile and format the activities, descriptions, and images into a presentable document or digital format.
